name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-003 Drainage (Pre-cast Structures) & Checklist - Rev.7
template name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-003 Drainage (Pre-cast Structures) & Checklist - Rev.7

name: Ref docs - Issued drawings / Site copy drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Check that you have the latest site and engineering drawings BEFORE starting each task/set of tasks.
Acceptance Criteria - Prepare a lot map for traceability of the work area
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 2.2]
Acceptance Criteria - Submit Drawings and Installation Procedures for Precast Pits to the Superintendent for Review prior to delivery of the first pit to site
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 2.2]
Acceptance Criteria - Does the supplied pit, slab, culvert or headwall meet all requirements of the specification and the drawings
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Underlying services and/or assets have been installed prior to commencing works over and/or above.
Acceptance Criteria - Setout pits to the location and levels on the drawings. This shall be presented for inspection by the superintendent.
Acceptance Criteria - Any Unsuitable Material to be removed to the depth as directed by the Superintendent
Acceptance Criteria - Foundation (including any unsuitable replacement) to be compacted to a relative compaction of 95% to a depth of 150mm below foundation level
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1353 Stormwater Box Culverts [Cl 3.4], Spec. 1351 Stormwater Drainage [Cl 2.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Precast Structures to be installed on bed of Select Fill with a minimum thickness of 150mm
○ Bedding layer to be compacted to a relative compaction of 95%
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Pit Buoyancy Slabs to be installed and bolted to precast pits as per the design drawings.
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.1, 3.3]
Acceptance Criteria - Pits to be installed as per drawings and manufacturers specifications utilising certified lifting points.
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.3]
Acceptance Criteria - Access covers, grates and frames to be installed as per AS 3996
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.3]
Acceptance Criteria - Pits deeper than 600 to be fitted with galvanised plastic-coated step irons as per AS1657
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.3]
Acceptance Criteria - Inlet and outlet pipes to be connected into precast pit walls as per design drawings & manufacturer specifications
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Internal joints between precast pits and riser units to be waterproofed as per Symal RFI-037 & manufacturer recommendations.
○ External Joints between pits and abutting concrete pavement, kerb or structures to be a 10mm isolation joint.
Ref docs - Spec. 1354 Stormwater Drainage Structures [Cl 3.7], Spec. 1112 Earthworks [Cl 4.10]
Acceptance Criteria - Precast Structures to be backfilled & compacted in 150mm thick layers.
○ Backfill to be Select fill for material within 1.5m of pavement surface and General Fill below 1.5m deep.
○ Select backfill material to be a granular material with a maximum particle size of 50mm and a PI between 2 & 12
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum relative compaction requirements for backfill against pits to be:
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Moisture Content for Backfill material to be within 60% to 95% OMC unless otherwise approved by Superintendent
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - An as-built survey of the drainage system been completed to ensure all structures are within construction tolerances.
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
3.2 - Acceptance and closure of non-conforming items
Acceptance Criteria - NCRs to be opened for non-conforming items and closed prior to closing construction lot.
